DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of the clinical effectiveness and cost-effectiveness of the MIS anterolateral approach (MIS Watson Jones, G3) versus anterolateral mini or posterolateral mini approaches in primary total hip arthroplasty
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Minimally Invasive Surgical Techniques for Hip Replacement
DOC.criteria: No contralateral hip symptoms, no major comorbidity
